message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $14,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $11,750. This is a fair offer considering its potential benefits for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500, but that's as high as I can go.
